headline: United increases airport lounge fees to counter overcrowding
summary: United Airlines increased fees on memberships that grant travelers access to the carrier's airport lounges, which have been in high demand in the years since the pandemic.

raw.headline: United increases airport lounge fees to counter overcrowding
raw.summary: United Airlines increased fees on memberships that grant travelers access to the carrier's airport lounges, which have been in high demand in the years since the pandemic.

headline: United Airlines Stock Rises as Airline Raises Credit Card, Club Access Fees
summary: United Airlines shares jumped Monday as the carrier rolled out changes to its JPMorgan Chase co-branded credit cards, including new perks for cardholders and higher fees.

raw.headline: United Airlines Stock Rises as Airline Raises Credit Card, Club Access Fees
raw.summary: United Airlines shares jumped Monday as the carrier rolled out changes to its JPMorgan Chase co-branded credit cards, including new perks for cardholders and higher fees.

headline: United Airlines raises lounge, card fees amid financial pressure
summary: United Airlines (UAL) announced it is raising annual fees for its yearly lounge passes and co-branded Chase credit cards. Wealth hosts Brad Smith and Madison Mills highlight how this shift reflects the broader trend of airlines increasing fees for premium services, partly due to lower-than-expected business travel post-pandemic. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: United Hikes Card, Lounge Fees. Airline Stocks Are Rising.
summary: Airline stocks jumped Monday as tariff fears eased and United Airlines hiked annual credit card and lounge membership fees.

raw.headline: United Hikes Card, Lounge Fees. Airline Stocks Are Rising.
raw.summary: Airline stocks jumped Monday as tariff fears eased and United Airlines hiked annual credit card and lounge membership fees.

headline: Your United Airlines Credit Card Is Going to Cost More
summary: The carrier is raising annual fees for cards and lounge memberships, but says that perks are improving and that consumers are still spending.

raw.headline: Your United Airlines Credit Card Is Going to Cost More
raw.summary: The carrier is raising annual fees for cards and lounge memberships, but says that perks are improving and that consumers are still spending.

headline: Chase and United Airlines Announce New and Enhanced Travel Benefits for United MileagePlus Cardmembers, Providing the Most Value It’s Ever Offered
summary: WILMINGTON, Del. & CHICAGO, March 24, 2025--Today, Chase and United Airlines revealed the brand-new United Family of Cards from Chase, with new and enhanced benefits designed to make flying the world’s largest airline* even more rewarding, valuable and personalized. United Cards have always provided United MileagePlus members with ways to earn on travel and every day spend and redeem miles, but now, each card offers a distinct set of additional benefits tailored to meet the needs of a variety of
